Posts.Content: thanks for the reply glad to hear u r getting on so well im lucky in a way as my mum has breast cancer aswell and already going through chemo so she can help me threw it but its the thought of loosing my boobs thats the scariest and im a rather large g cup so a lot to loose but good side should have no back probs after nice to hear other peoples opinion love michelle
Posts.Title: Mastectomy or not?

Posts.Content: im due a double mastectomy on monday and have had the worst week so far scared is not the word sorry dont really know what to say but needed to type somthing but i have a grade 3 gone into nodes but no further i only have it in one but feel i need to have both took have my op monday 27thall of us have to do whats best 4 us Â
